summary: September 1 is the 244th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Junction is a city in and the county seat of Kimble County, Texas, United States. The population was 2,618 at the 2000 census.

^ City of Junction, Texas - Official site.
^ "Junction, Texas". Texas Escapes Online Magazine. Retrieved 2009-06-05. 
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Junction, Texas
